website_summaries.verdict: A well-received filter designed to eliminate particulate matter and contaminants from hydraulic fluids in larger machinery.
pros: Pleated paper filters out contaminants down to the microscopic size
Provides a linear flow path for hydraulic fluid in large equipment, such as log splitters and other machinery
cons: This filter isn’t a match for smaller hydraulic systems
it only works on larger equipment

customer_reviews.title: Fine Filter but doesn't fit as recommended
customer_reviews.text: In the owners manual, online and on Amazon it shows this filter as a cross reference for the Dirty Hand Tools 100116. It does not fit the threads at all. So either the one I got had defective threads, or its just not a match.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: What can I say when this IS the BEST?
customer_reviews.text: I use this 51551 WIX or NAPA Gold 1551 exclusively on my Hustler Super Z Zero Turn Mower. It makes no sense to use cheaply made filters of low to zero quality on expensive equipment that makes you money. Take all the other filters apart alongside the same in WIX for any application and you will see what I'm talking about. WIX is simply the best and highest quality filter that you can buy at any price. I also use WIX on our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Henery Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Did not allow flow in proper direction for my use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace Baldwin BT839-10 in my MotorVac because the filter had never been replaced. When I installed it, gas would not flow in correct direction & when I removed it, the gas in the filter was under pressure despite having theoretically released all the pressure. Upon reinstalling the original filter, it worked. This filter was listed by WIX as a direct replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to cross thread
customer_reviews.text: Got as a replacement hydraulic filter for my Dirty Hands 22 ton log splitter, as DH did not have them in stock. Works just as good, however it is very easy to cross thread. I turn it backwards till I feel it seat, then turn it on. If WIX did a better job with their threading, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: theo3br

customer_reviews.title: Good price, perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 22 ton Dirty Hands wood splitter. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: M Provence

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Wix 51551 is an excellent ( and exact in size) replacement part for Hustler Super Z hydraulic filter. I would not recommend using some of the small filters, regardless of quality, that some sellers market as replacement filters. My opinion is that the Hustler hydraulic system needs the large filter media area that you get from the large filter..
customer_reviews.author: SWB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hydraulic fluid filter
customer_reviews.text: Direct replacement for the Dirty Hand Tools 22 ton log-splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works on 30 ton dirty hand tools splitter
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 30 ton dirty hand tools splitter
customer_reviews.author: James Myers

customer_reviews.title: bought wrong one. my mistake. do your homework ...
customer_reviews.text: bought wrong one. my mistake. do your homework and don't get in a hurry when ordering. There are a lot of choices, and kind of hard to sort them all out.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: After searching for a hydraulic filter for my log splitter ...
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a hydraulic filter for my log splitter because manufacture wanted $50.00 for a replacement purchased this wix filter figured what did I have to lose worked perfectly will be ordering more and putting into stock
customer_reviews.author: Ducktrkr

customer_reviews.title: Great product with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: It was ridiculously fast shipping and well packaged when it arrived. I ordered it late Saturday (I think around 6pm) and it was sitting on my doorstep Monday when I got home around 5 p.m. I have Amazon prime so shipping was free. It is a direct replacement for my stump grinder's hydraulic system. WIX filters are quality filters and I've had no issues with them. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bart DeBellis

customer_reviews.title: Bobcat hydraulic filter
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Bought for dirty hand tools 35 ton log splitter. Cheaper on amazon than local Napa.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 35 ton Dirty Hand Tools Log Splitter.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance not being sure that it would fit the 35 ton model. Fits perfectly, and has been used for 2 1/2 hours with no leaks or other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Ganter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filter, fit my Troy built 33ton splitter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent filter, fit my Troy built 33ton splitter. The auto parts house filter blew off the threads and this filter fit much better!

customer_reviews.title: No problems yet
customer_reviews.text: seems to be working exactly as described, you really never know unless there is a problem, and i have not had a problem yet.

product_meta.title: WIX Filters - 51551 Heavy Duty Spin-On Hydraulic Filter, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Wix Spin-On Hydraulic Filters are designed to remove particle contaminants from the hydraulic fluid. They are made of pleated paper which filters the contaminants down to microscopic size and provide a linear path for low flow restriction. These filters reduce corrosion and abrasion of hydraulic components and are highly durable and reliable.
feature_bullets: Removes particle contaminants from the hydraulic fluid
Provides linear path for low flow restriction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
